instruction: Explain why experts don't recommend having more than 6 tabs open at the same time.
output: Having too many open tabs can affect the system's performance as it puts a strain on the computer's memory and other resources. Too many open tabs also cause the system to become slow and sluggish, which may lead to a decrease in productivity. Additionally, having too many tabs can be overwhelming, making it difficult to stay organized and focused on the task at hand.
